content: TEST: [2025, Age 22] The neon-lit streets of Tokyo have ignited my vision for tech. Just had an epiphany at a VR arcade - integrating Web3 into immersive experiences could redefine user interaction. Time to sketch out ideas with Aiden back in NYC.
variations: I bet in a few years, people will be saying, “Remember when we didn’t trust crypto?” Wild. Should I try my hand at it? Let me know if anyone’s got experience.
